info.description: Allows the creation, viewing and management of security orders
info.title: Security Orders

post.summary: Creates a stop price limit order
post.description: Creates a stop price limit order with the transaction channel

parameters.name: payload
parameters.description: body Payload

parameters.name: validate_only
parameters.description: The identifier to indicate if it is set to only validate or not.

parameters.name: credentials
parameters.description: Username and password to authenticate the API against core-banking.

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: The identifier of the underlying Entity/Company/Branch.

parameters.name: deviceId
parameters.description: Identifies the device type

parameters.name: userRole
parameters.description: User who initiated the transaction

code.description: The code related to override message.

responseCode.description: The user input to accept/reject the override.

dateToBroker.description: Specifies the date a particular Order has been placed with the Broker/Counterparty

amountToBroker.description: Specifies the particular amount of an order which has been placed with the previously defined Broker

customers.description: The type of charge or tax to be paid by the customer

portfolioId.description: Id of the portfolio or security account

depository.description: Person designated as depository by the company in or pursuant to this Indenture, and, unless otherwise provided with respect to any security, any successor to such person

accountId.description: Identifier of the account. Often referred to as the account number, yet for consistency this is always referred to as accountId. Accepts both IBAN & BBAN

price.description: The Price at which the nominal amount of the Security is to be valued for the transaction.

calculateCharges.description: Indicates whether charges will be calculated.  Allowed values: - YES - null (default)

chargesGrossOrNet.description: Indicates whether the cash amount is to include charges (NET) or have charges applied in addition to the trade consideration (GROSS). Allowed values: - NET - GROSS

rounding.description: Defines the rounding type for the amount calculated or input

adjustCommission.description: Determine whether to reduce the commission in order to make the total trade match the cash amount exactly.

settlementCurrency.description: The currency of the trade settlement

brokerCommission.description: Amount of broker commission charged to the customer for the trade.

foreignFee.description: This field Records the Foreign Fee amount charged to the Customer for the trade.

commission.description: The bank fees or commission charged for the transaction

customerCommissionTax.description: Specifies the tax amount based on the commission charged

stampTax.description: The Stamp Tax amount charged to the Customer for the trade

EBVFee.description: This field Records the amount of EBV Fees charged to the Customer for the trade.

miscellaneousFees.description: The amount of miscellaneous fees charged to the Customer for the trade

incomeAccount.description: The customer account to which income or expenses are debited/credited

incomeAccountCurrency.description: The currency of the customer's income account

customerWitholdingTax.description: Specifies the amount of Tax on the Securities up to the Value Date of the trade

buyingPower.description: Indicates the buying power of the portfolio on placement of order

customerChargeTaxType.description: The type of charge or tax to be paid by the customer

customerChargeTaxAmount.description: The amount of charges or taxes to be paid by customer

transactionChannel.description: The channel through which the transaction has been placed

tradeCurrency.description: The trade currency is the settlement currency for the trade

transactionType.description: Identifies the transaction type applicable to the transaction being processed, i.e. outward or inward payment. For example: ACPX, OTPX etc.

orderDate.description: The order date of the instructions contained within the transaction

valueDate.description: Indicates the value date on which the underlying accounting entry is to be given value (for interest purposes)

orderedAt.description: The time at which the order has been transacted

orderType.description: Identifies the type of the order. Possible values are Single, Ifdone, Revol, oco. Single order - only one order item may be input. If done order -  If one order gets executed, the other order is also executed immediately. Revolving order -  based on the condition specified, it will wait for both the deals to be executed simultaneously. OCO -If one order gets executed, then the other order gets cancelled.

switchMethod.description: If the switch is within same fund house(intra) or between fund houses

switchSpecification.description: Mode of the switch order (Unit / Percentage / Amount)

masterOrderOfSwitch.description: Indicates if this is the Master Order for Switch orders

commonSwitchRef.description: The field will hold a common reference to link a set of switch orders.

noOfSwitchOrder.description: Number of Orders in a Switch Order combination

threadKey.description: The thread key for an order created by a service

marketPrice.description: Current Market Price of the Security

limitPrice.description: The Price at which the shares are to be bought or sold

limitType.description: Defines the limit type for the trade

limitExpiryDate.description: This field specifies the validity of the Limit, i.e. how long is it to remain in force

fractionalOrder.description: Indicate If this is an odd lot order

frontOfficeInstructions.description: Optional free text field to capture any narrative for the account officer.

approximateSettlementAmount.description: The order value (Nominal x Price ) for each customer in the security currency. If a limit price is input and transaction code is debit, lower price among market and limit price is used for sell and higher price is used for buy. If transaction code is credit, then lowest is used.

parent.description: This Field is to determine whether the order is a parent order, Allowed value is YES

parentReference.description: The parent reference that is common for both parent and child orders and will serve as a link.

id.description: The Identifier of the record created

uniqueIdentifier.description: The unique identifier/Message Reference of the record created.

T24_time.description: Time taken to response by T24

requestParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the request by IRIS

responseParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the response by IRIS

uniqueIdentifier.description: The unique identifier/Message Reference of the record created.

T24_time.description: Time taken to response by T24

requestParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the request by IRIS

responseParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the response by IRIS

code.description: The code related to override message.

options.description: The usable options for the override.

code.description: The identifier of the error message
The identifier of the error message

message.description: The actual t24 error message for bad requests

type.description: The identifier of error type: Business

code.description: The identifier of the error message

message.description: The actual t24 error message caused by server

type.description: The identifier of error type: System

T24_time.description: Time taken to response by T24

requestParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the request by IRIS

responseParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the response by IRIS

page_size.description: The total number of records per page

page_start.description: The record from which the response should be displayed

total_size.description: The total number of records present

page_token.description: Unique id expected to get as part of response from t24 on every enquiry request

portfolioId.description: Id of the portfolio or security account

tradeCurrency.description: The trade currency is the settlement currency for the trade

localCurrencyId.description: The ISO code (3 letters) for the institution's local currency.

advisoryFeesInTradeCurrency.description: This indicates the Advisory Fees amount in trade currency

advisoryFeesInChargeCurrency.description: This indicates the Advisory Fees amount in Charge currency

advisoryFeesFrequency.description: This indicates the Advisory Fees frequency

safekeepChargeInTradeCurrency.description: This indicates the SafeCustody Charge amount in trade currency

safekeepChargeInChargeCurrency.description: This indicates the SafeCustody Charge amount in Charge currency

safekeepChargeFrequency.description: This indicates the SafeCustody Charge frequency

InducementFeesInTradeCurrency.description: This indicates the Inducement Fees amount in trade currency

InducementFeesInChargeCurrency.description: This indicates the Inducement Fees amount in Charge currency

InducementFeesFrequency.description: This indicates the Inducement Fees Frequency
